plot: The makers of this parody of "Night of the Living Dead" took George Romero's classic and wiped the soundtrack clean, then redubbed it with comedic dialogue.
title: Night of the Day of the Dawn of the Son of the Bride of the Return of the Terror
plot_es: The makers of this parody of "Night of the Living Dead" took George Romero's classic and wiped the soundtrack clean, then redubbed it with comedic dialogue.
original_name: Night of the Day of the Dawn of the Son of the Bride of the Return of the Terror
plot_en: The makers of this parody of "Night of the Living Dead" took George Romero's classic and wiped the soundtrack clean, then redubbed it with comedic dialogue.
